isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 5 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER ES62-5A, ES62-5D, ES67-5A AND ES67-5D - LUBRICATION - REFILL

svcproc.title: REFILL
svcproc.para: First, remove all dirt around the filler plug. Then refill the transmission with new oil. Use the grade recommended for the existing season and prevailing service in GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS - 5000 Master Service Manual, or the Operators Manual supplied with the vehicle for unit refill capacity. The lubricant should be level with the oil fill plug located on the right side of the transmission case.
